SwarmNodeInstanceType.Description: Swarm Node EC2 HVM instance type (t2.medium, m3.medium, etc).
SwarmNodeInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 HVM instance type.

NATInstanceType.Description: NAT EC2 HVM instance type (t2.small, m3.medium, etc).
NATInstanceType.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EC2 HVM instance type.

SwarmClusterSize.Description: Number of nodes in the Swarm cluster (3-12). The Actual size of the cluster is (SwarmClusterSize + 1) due to additional ADOP reverse proxy node created in the swarm cluster.

OuterProxyClusterSize.Description: Number of nodes in the Outer Proxy cluster (1-12).

SwarmDiscoveryURL.Description: A unique etcd cluster discovery URL. Grab a new token from https://discovery.etcd.io/new?size=1

WhitelistAddress.Description: The net block (CIDR) from which SSH to the proxy, swarm nodes and NAT instances is available. The public load balancer access is also restricted to same CIDR block. By default (0.0.0.0/0) allows access from everywhere. RECOMMENDED TO CHANGE.

KeyName.Description: The name of an EC2 Key Pair to allow SSH access to the ec2 instances.

VpcAvailabilityZones.Description: Comma-delimited list of three VPC availability zones in which nodes are created. This would work in the region with three AZ's.

SSLCertificateARN.Description: ARN for SSL certificate to be used for ELB.

Fn::Join: docker run --restart="always" --name docker-swarm-master -d -p 2375:2375 swarm manage -H :2375 --replication --advertise ${IP}:2375 etcd://${IP}:2379/swarm
docker run --restart="always" --name docker-swarm-node -d swarm join --addr=${IP}:4243 etcd://
docker run --restart="always" --name docker-swarm-node -d swarm join --addr=${IP}:4243 etcd://

ELBPublicDNSURL.Description: Public URL to access the ADOP Stack

ELBPublicDNSName.Description: DNS name of the public load balancer

ADOPReverseProxy.Description: Private URL to access the ADOP Proxy

SwarmMasterIP.Description: Private IP Address of the swarm master server.
